_comment: NYT Critics' Pick and other designations. Verified via web search.

hamilton-2015.notes: Called it 'yes, it really is that good' - landmark rave review

hadestown-2019.notes: Praised as 'sumptuous, hypnotic' - won Best Musical Tony

moulin-rouge-2019.notes: Called it 'a cloud-surfing, natural high of a production'

book-of-mormon-2011.notes: Called 'best new musical of the century' - definitive rave

six-2021.notes: Called it 'a rollicking, reverberant blast from the past' - 'TOTALLY RULES!'

stereophonic-2024.notes: Called 'astonishing' - record Tony nominations for a play

hells-kitchen-2024.notes: Described as 'thrilling from beginning to end - a rare must-see'

oh-mary-2024.notes: Called 'one of the best crafted Broadway comedies in years'

water-for-elephants-2024.notes: Called it 'Miracles do happen. A gorgeously imaginative Broadway musical'

maybe-happy-ending-2024.notes: NYT Twitter confirmed: 'supersmart musical...it's a Critic's Pick'

oedipus-2025.notes: Called Mark Strong and Lesley Manville 'superb' - 'electrifying'

liberation-2025.notes: Called 'a gripping, funny, and daring work of great ambition'

ragtime-2025.notes: Praised 'glorious cast' led by Joshua Henry, Caissie Levy, Brandon Uranowitz

marjorie-prime-2025.notes: Praised Kauffman as 'master at creating emotion'

bug-2026.notes: Praised Carrie Coon and Namir Smallwood's performances

buena-vista-social-club-2025.notes: Called it 'the thrill of music making'

the-outsiders-2024.notes: Mixed review - NOT a Critics' Pick despite winning Best Musical Tony

cabaret-2024.notes: Mixed review - praised some elements but noted 'breaks its ribs'

mj-2022.notes: Mixed reviews - NOT confirmed as Critics' Pick

the-notebook-2024.notes: Negative review - 'I was the person next to you' - NOT a Critics' Pick

just-in-time-2025.notes: Mixed review - praised Groff but 'dismayed to endure so much else'

death-becomes-her-2024.notes: Mixed review - praised Hilty/Simard but 'stuck with foundational problems of the film'

operation-mincemeat-2025.notes: Mixed review - called it 'diverting if irksome' - NOT a Critics' Pick

boop-2025.notes: Negative review - called it 'boop-boop-a-don't' and a 'why? show' - praised Rogers' performance only

wicked-2003.notes: Negative review - called it 'a sermon' that 'overplays its hand' with a 'generic' score

aladdin-2014.notes: Mixed review - 'defied my dour expectations' but not a rave - NOT a Critics' Pick

the-lion-king-1997.notes: Positive review - 'jaw-dropping magnificent spectacle' - predates modern Critics' Pick system

chicago-1996.notes: Positive review - praised revival highly - predates modern Critics' Pick system

and-juliet-2022.notes: Mixed review - called it 'cotton candy jukebox musical' - NOT a Critics' Pick

stranger-things-2024.notes: Mixed review - NOT a Critics' Pick

the-great-gatsby-2024.notes: Mixed review - NOT a Critics' Pick

mamma-mia-2025.notes: Critic's Notebook piece - not standard review format

harry-potter-2021.notes: Called it 'a game changer' - 2018 original review was a Critics' Pick

timeout_critics_choice._comment: Time Out uses 'Recommended' badges. We map to Critics_Choice designation.

guardian_picks._comment: Guardian uses 5-star ratings. 4-5 stars = Recommended equivalent.
